trans-unit.resname: VOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Millicent, Restless Revenant
trans-unit.target: 不息复灵米蕾森

trans-unit.resname: VOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Spirit you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个精怪，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·1 | Millicent, Restless Revenant | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Millicent, Restless Revenant or another nontoken Spirit you control dies or deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当不息复灵米蕾森或另一个由你操控且非衍生物的精怪死去或对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出一个1/1白色， 具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Strefan, Maurer Progenitor
trans-unit.target: 茂威原祖史崔凡

trans-unit.resname: VOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create a Blood token for each player who lost life this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，每有一位本回合中失去过生命的牌手，便派出一个血滴衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·2 | Strefan, Maurer Progenitor | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Strefan attacks, you may sacrifice two Blood tokens. If you do, you may put a Vampire card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. It gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当史崔凡攻击时，你可以牺牲两个血滴衍生物。若你如此作，则你可以将一张吸血鬼牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。它获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·3 | Donal, Herald of Wings | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Donal, Herald of Wings
trans-unit.target: 羽翼传令使唐诺

trans-unit.resname: VOC·3 | Donal, Herald of Wings | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a nonlegendary creature spell with flying, you may copy it, except the copy is a 1/1 Spirit in addition to its other types. Do this only once each turn. (The copy becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放具飞行异能的非传奇生物咒语时，你可以复制之，但该复制品是1/1精怪，且仍具有原本类别。每回合只能如此作一次。（所成之复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·3 | Donal, Herald of Wings | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He sees a flicker of Avacyn's grace in every wingbeat.
trans-unit.target: 他在翅翼扇动间得见艾维欣光辉。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·4 | Timothar, Baron of Bats | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Timothar, Baron of Bats
trans-unit.target: 血蝠男爵提默沙

trans-unit.resname: VOC·4 | Timothar, Baron of Bats | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Ward— Discard a card. Whenever another nontoken Vampire you control dies, you may pay {1} and exile it. If you do, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying. It gains "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and return the exiled card to the battlefield tapped."
trans-unit.target: 守护～弃一张牌。 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的吸血鬼死去时，你可以支付{1}并将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个1/1黑色，具飞行异能的蝙蝠衍生生物。它获得「当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将它牺牲，并将所放逐之牌横置移回战场。」

trans-unit.resname: VOC·5 | Drogskol Reinforcements | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drogskol Reinforcements
trans-unit.target: 卓兹克援军

trans-unit.resname: VOC·5 | Drogskol Reinforcements | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)
trans-unit.target: 乱斗（每当此生物攻击时，本次战斗中每有一位受你攻击的对手，此生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·5 | Drogskol Reinforcements | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other Spirits you control have melee.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他精怪具有乱斗异能。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·5 | Drogskol Reinforcements | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to Spirits you control.
trans-unit.target: 防止将对由你操控的精怪造成的所有非战斗伤害。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·6 | Haunted Library | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Haunted Library
trans-unit.target: 闹鬼图书馆

trans-unit.resname: VOC·6 | Haunted Library | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·6 | Haunted Library | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The library of Moormanor had been open to all before the Travails, and it continues to attract curious visitors.
trans-unit.target: 在癫狂劫之前，荒邸图书馆原本就向公众开放，而今仍能引来好奇的访客。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·7 | Priest of the Blessed Graf | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Priest of the Blessed Graf
trans-unit.target: 受福墓地僧侣

trans-unit.resname: VOC·7 | Priest of the Blessed Graf | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of opponents who control more lands than you.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，派出X个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物，X为操控之地比你多的对手数量。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·7 | Priest of the Blessed Graf | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The honored dead who lie in blessed grafs are not easily stirred, but the threat of eternal night called many from their rest.
trans-unit.target: 得获光荣厚葬在受福墓地的逝者不会轻易遭到惊扰，但永夜的威胁让他们受托再起。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·8 | Rhoda, Geist Avenger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rhoda, Geist Avenger
trans-unit.target: 携魂复仇者洛妲

trans-unit.resname: VOC·8 | Rhoda, Geist Avenger | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Partner with Timin, Youthful Geist (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Timin into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 与年幼游魂提敏拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将提敏从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·8 | Rhoda, Geist Avenger | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: VOC·8 | Rhoda, Geist Avenger | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, put a +1/+1 counter on Rhoda, Geist Avenger.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物成为横置时，若它并非于将其宣告为攻击者时而如此，则在携魂复仇者洛妲上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·9 | Storm of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Storm of Souls
trans-unit.target: 灵魂风暴

trans-unit.resname: VOC·9 | Storm of Souls | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Each of them is a 1/1 Spirit with flying in addition to its other types. Exile Storm of Souls.
trans-unit.target: 将所有生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它们为具飞行异能的1/1精怪，且仍具有原本类别。放逐灵魂风暴。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·9 | Storm of Souls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Devotion does not end with death.
trans-unit.target: 奉献不以死亡而告终。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·10 | Sudden Salvation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sudden Salvation
trans-unit.target: 突获救助

trans-unit.resname: VOC·10 | Sudden Salvation | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose up to three target permanent cards in graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control. You draw a card for each opponent who controls one or more of those permanents.
trans-unit.target: 选择至多三张目标在坟墓场中的永久物牌，且须为于本回合中从战场进入该处者。将它们在各自拥有者的操控下横置移回战场。每有一位操控一个或更多此类永久物的对手，你便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·11 | Breath of the Sleepless | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Breath of the Sleepless
trans-unit.target: 无眠者寒息

trans-unit.resname: VOC·11 | Breath of the Sleepless | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将精怪咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·11 | Breath of the Sleepless | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a creature spell during an opponent's turn, tap up to one target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你在对手的回合中施放生物咒语时，横置至多一个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·11 | Breath of the Sleepless | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Worse than the obscuring mists are the ghastly faces that appear in the glow of spectral lanterns.
trans-unit.target: 比遮天迷雾更糟糕的，莫过于街灯幽光下显现的可怖亡颜。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·12 | Ethereal Investigator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ethereal Investigator
trans-unit.target: 虚相调查员

trans-unit.resname: VOC·12 | Ethereal Investigator | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·12 | Ethereal Investigator | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Ethereal Investigator enters the battlefield, investigate X times, where X is the number of opponents you have. (To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当虚相调查员进战场时，探查X次，X为你的对手数量。（探查的流程是派出一个无色线索衍生神器，且具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·12 | Ethereal Investigator | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·13 | Haunting Imitation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Haunting Imitation
trans-unit.target: 幽冥模仿

trans-unit.resname: VOC·13 | Haunting Imitation | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each creature card revealed this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. If no creature cards were revealed this way, return Haunting Imitation to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。对以法此展示的每张生物牌而言，你派出一个为该牌之复制品的衍生物，但它是1/1，额外具有精怪此类别，且具有飞行异能。如果未以此法展示出生物牌，则将幽冥模仿移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·14 | Occult Epiphany | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Occult Epiphany
trans-unit.target: 秘学顿悟

trans-unit.resname: VOC·14 | Occult Epiphany | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: 抓X张牌，然后弃X张牌。以此法弃掉的牌中每有一种牌张类别，便派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·14 | Occult Epiphany | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In a single unending moment, a hundred lifetimes of knowledge coursed through his unraveling mind.
trans-unit.target: 在那一瞬无尽时刻，他思绪动荡跳跃，仿佛有整整一百辈子的知识奔流其间。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·15 | Spectral Arcanist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spectral Arcanist
trans-unit.target: 幽灵奥术师

trans-unit.resname: VOC·15 | Spectral Arcanist | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·15 | Spectral Arcanist | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Spectral Arcanist enters the battlefield, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of Spirits you control from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 当幽灵奥术师进战场时，你可以从任一坟墓场中施放一个法术力值等于或小于由你操控之精怪数量的瞬间或法术咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。若该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Timin, Youthful Geist
trans-unit.target: 年幼游魂提敏

trans-unit.resname: VOC·16 | Timin, Youthful Geist | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Partner with Rhoda, Geist Avenger (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Rhoda into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 与携魂复仇者洛妲拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将洛妲从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·16 | Timin, Youthful Geist | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: VOC·16 | Timin, Youthful Geist | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each combat, tap up to one target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在每次战斗开始时，横置至多一个目标生物。

trans-unit.target: 大道惹祸徒

trans-unit.resname: VOC·17 | Crossway Troublemakers | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking Vampires you control have deathtouch and lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且进行攻击的吸血鬼具有死触与系命异能。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·17 | Crossway Troublemakers | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Vampire you control dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的吸血鬼死去时，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·17 | Crossway Troublemakers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Lady Anje said no violence at the wedding. She never said anything about the journey there!"
trans-unit.target: 「安姬大人不许我们在婚宴上动粗。但赴宴的路上可没有任何指示！」

trans-unit.target: 琉璃心像

trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个由你操控的吸血鬼攻击时，派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·18 | Glass-Cast Heart | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，支付1点生命：派出一个1/1，白黑双色，具系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·18 | Glass-Cast Heart | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Glass-Cast Heart and thirteen Blood tokens: Each opponent loses 13 life and you gain 13 life.
trans-unit.target: {B}{B}，{T}，牺牲琉璃心像和十三个血滴衍生物：每位对手各失去13点生命且你获得13点生命。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·19 | Kamber, the Plunderer | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 劫掠者康芭

trans-unit.resname: VOC·19 | Kamber, the Plunderer | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 与诱敌手劳琳拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将劳琳从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·19 | Kamber, the Plunderer | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 系命

trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，你获得1点生命并派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·20 | Olivia's Wrath | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 奥莉薇亚之怒

trans-unit.resname: VOC·20 | Olivia's Wrath | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.
trans-unit.target: 所有非吸血鬼生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的吸血鬼数量。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·20 | Olivia's Wrath | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "These worthless cattle think they can sneak unnoticed into my wedding? Dispose of them."\n—Olivia Voldaren
trans-unit.target: 「这些无用畜牲妄想溜进我的婚礼？解决他们。」 ～奥莉薇亚沃达连

trans-unit.resname: VOC·21 | Predators' Hour | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Predators' Hour
trans-unit.target: 掠食时刻

trans-unit.resname: VOC·21 | Predators' Hour | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell."
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物获得威慑与「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，牌面朝下地放逐该牌手的牌库顶牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视并使用该牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。」

trans-unit.resname: VOC·22 | Shadowgrange Archfiend | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shadowgrange Archfiend
trans-unit.target: 影庄大邪鬼

trans-unit.resname: VOC·22 | Shadowgrange Archfiend | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Shadowgrange Archfiend enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures sacrificed this way.
trans-unit.target: 当影庄大邪鬼进战场时，每位对手各牺牲一个生物，且须是由其操控的生物中力量最大者。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法牺牲之生物中的最大力量。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·22 | Shadowgrange Archfiend | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Madness—{2}{B}, Pay 8 life. (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 疯魔～{2}{B}，支付8点生命。（如果你弃掉此牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·23 | Arterial Alchemy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Arterial Alchemy
trans-unit.target: 点血成金

trans-unit.resname: VOC·23 | Arterial Alchemy | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Arterial Alchemy enters the battlefield, create a Blood token for each opponent you have. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当点血成金进战场时，你每有一位对手，便派出一个血滴衍生物。（血滴衍生物是具有「{1}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: VOC·23 | Arterial Alchemy | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Blood tokens you control are Equipment in addition to their other types and have "Equipped creature gets +2/+0" and equip {2}.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的血滴衍生物额外具有武具此类别，且具有「佩带此武具的生物得+2/+0」与佩带{2}。

trans-unit.resname: VOC·24 | Imposing Grandeur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imposing Grandeur
trans-unit.target: 威风凛凛

trans-unit.resname: VOC·24 | Imposing Grandeur | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each player may discard their hand and draw cards equal to the greatest mana value of a commander they own on the battlefield or in the command zone.

trans-unit.source: "Mandatory lockets enable the tracking of all Senate personnel for improved security and efficiency."\n—Dovin Baan
trans-unit.target: 「所有参议院成员均须佩带坠饰，这样能确实掌握动向，保证安全，提高效率。」 ～多温班恩

trans-unit.target: 「贸然参战乃是智者所为…如果你做好了准备的话。」 ～千刃团队长肯耶珂
